ref: 4472 *ghicca ʻ neck ʼ. 2. *ghiñca -- . 3. *ghēñcu -- . [J. Bloch in letter 1946 < *ghṛtya -- from Indo -- ir. *ghart<-> ʻ neck ʼ in ghāṭā -- q.v., *ghaṇṭa -- . But cf. *gicca -- and list s.v. kaṇṭhá -- ]
N. ghicro ʻ nape of neck ʼ (with ext. -- ḍa -- ),
H. ghīc m. ʻ lower or front part of neck ʼ.
